article: april ## has passed , and with it the chance to see a unk exhibition of icons , rare manuscripts , silver and gold vessels , shimmery vestments and other artifacts from the eastern orthodox monasteries of mount athos in northern greece , which had been on view at the museum of byzantine culture in salonika since last june .
